last_episode_to_air.name: Left For Dead
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jessica Goebel is brutally stabbed in her own home and left to die near her young children; two suspects emerge: the father of her children and her new boyfriend; Jessica's sister Shannon relives the details of her sister's death.

name: Raw Terror
overview: A six-part series focusing on the stories of people devastated by a loved oneâ€™s murder. Using highly personal, self-shot footage, the show examines the murder and the effect on those left behind.
